thoughts.text: I think I can use the 'list_files' command to check if the file exists before attempting to read it.
thoughts.reasoning: It is important to always verify that a file exists before attempting to read it to avoid errors.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to check if the file exists.
- If the file exists, use the 'read_file' command to read the file.
